model

Interface ScreeningDAO

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ScreeningDAOImpl

    public interface ScreeningDAO
    Purpose: The DAO interface lists methods to CRUD (create/add, get, update, delete) the data in the corresponding table. DAO serves to separate to decouple persistence storage (DB) information from the rest of the application. References: http://www.swtestacademy.com/database-operations-javafx/ https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=H1mePFyqqiE&t=18s
    Version:
    04/12/17
    Author:
    Michael Aring
